caption.center: CROSSPOINTE, INC., a Florida corporation, and JOAN MARIE KEEBLER,

court.center: District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District.

opinion.posture: An appeal from the circuit court for Escambia County, Terry D. Terrell, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Charles F. Beall, Jr., of Moore, Hill Westmoreland, P.A., Pensacola, for Appellant Crosspointe, Inc.; Michael E. Marder, Victor Kline and Amanda L. Chapman of Greenspoon, Marder, Hirschfeld, Rafkin, Ross Berger, P.A., Orlando, for Appellant Keebler.
Ronald W. Johnson of Kinsey, Troxel, Johnson Walborsky, P.A., Pensacola and Philip A. Bates, Pensacola, for Appellee.
opinion.opinion_text:
AFFIRMED.
KAHN, WEBSTER and VAN NORTWICK, JJ., CONCUR.
NOT FINAL UNTIL TIME EXPIRES TO FILE MOTION FOR REHEARING AND DISPOSITION THEREOF IF FILED.
